```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

## R Markdown
```{r}
boston_marathon<- read_csv("data/boston_marathon_2023.csv")

boston <- boston_marathon%>%
  arrange(finish_net_sec)%>%
  select(name, finish_net_sec)%>%
  head()

  knitr::kable(boston, digits = 3, caption = "2023 Boston Marathon")
```

```{r}
histogram_marathon<-ggplot(data = boston_marathon,
       aes(x = finish_net_sec))+
  geom_histogram(bins = 20, color = "white")+
  labs(x = "Result time (seconds)")

ggsave(filename = "histogram_marathon.jpg",
       plot = histogram_marathon,
       width = 7,
       height = 4)


summary(boston_marathon$finish_net_sec)
var(boston_marathon$finish_net_sec)
```

```{r}
boston_marathon%>%
  filter(gender == "M")%>%
  summarise(Mean = mean(finish_net_sec),
            Standard_Deviation = round(sd(finish_net_sec),2))
  
  
```

```{r}
boston_marathon%>%
  filter(gender == "M")%>%
  slice_min(finish_net_sec)
```
```{r}
boston_marathon%>%
  filter(gender == "W")%>%
  summarise(Mean = mean(finish_net_sec),
            Standard_Deviation = round(sd(finish_net_sec),2))

boston_marathon%>%
  filter(gender == "W")%>%
  slice_min(finish_net_sec)
```
